name: deployToAzureAnalysisServices
description: Deploys XMLA file produced by Analysis Services model to Azure Analysis Services
author: Christoph Bergmeister
instanceNameFormat: Deploy to Azure Analysis Services server $(azureAnalysisServerName)

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager service endpoint for the deployment.

inputs.name: xmlaFilePath
inputs.label: XMLA File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the XMLA file. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).
